Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
24.06.2014 GB SCR18980 Button Delete: extended test "Not allowed, draft already in batch"
14.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
07.09.2012 JOH SCR17496 Button Scan prepare: added range on DRFT_VIACSVFILE = 'N'
13.06.2012 JOH/SH SCR17258 Added button Import file
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
08.01.2012 GB SCR17024 Button Select Bank: changed the ADMU_ALLOW_MODIFY_BANK=Y into ADMU_ALLOW_QUERY_BANK='Y'
25.06.2011 GB SCR16557 Extended the Test1 if Button Make batches is pressed and
replaced the GNRL_SCANNINGOFPAYMENTDOCS by the GSBU_YESNO (2005)
27.04.2011 GB SCR16397 Replaced the GNRL_SCANNINGOFPAYMENTDOCS by
GSBU_YESNO (2005)
16.03.2011 GB SCR16294 Extended condition for allowed to delete a DRFT row
20.01.2010 GB SCR15231 Added verification in Select Bank - If there is no row in
01.08.2008 SH SCR13846 Make batches: Added test on HYPB_SCANNED = P
29.08.2007 SH SCR12861 Added order by DRFT_ID in task "PrepareScanning'
11.07.2007 AK SCR12618 canceled the possibilty not to scan for 'FR '
03.08.2006 SH SCR11670 Added GSET_QUANTITY (GSET_ID=217) to calc new
HYPB_BATCHNO if number of DRFT rows = GSET_QUANTITY
21.07.2006 SH SCR11612 Added GSET_YESNO (GSET_ID = 217) to button Scan prepare
The changes of SCR11257 (AK) are temporary disabled
17.05.2006 AK SCR11257 add 5 fields for(last entered)
11.05.2006 SH SCR11183 Fixed problems with deletion of HYPB in parts "Make
batches" and "Scan prepare"; Disabled button "Scan prepare" and "Make batches"
filter office = blank, add. "Scan prepare" is only allowed if filter office <>''
added filter date to all DRFT selections
12.04.2006 SH SCR10928 Extended test if scanning has to be prepared with
HUSR_HOFF_CODE <> 'FR'
14.02.2006 SH SCR10397 Added new HYPB fields
19.12.2005 SH SCR9743 Added v.UserFilter and v.OfficeFilter to argument list of
13.12.2005 SH SCR9743 Added v.OFFICE to DRFT handlings
16-09-2005 AK SCR:#9067 repeat last entered details on CREATE mode
10.08.2005 BT SCR8791 changed Buttonformat
05.07.2005 SH SCR8464 Added new button "Select bank"
-- Working fields
-- Global values
-- Filters
-- Radio button --> Selection
-- Shortcut labels
-- Get program permissons
-- Get special permissions for button 'Release'
-- Only if users have min. query right
-- Get lables fo radio button
-- Shortcut handling
-- Initialize variables
variables contain the details from the last entered fraft (to be able to
initielize the next new draft with the details from the last one)
-- Button New
-- store current DRFT_ID, uses to check if a new draft was entered (if a new
draft was entered, then v.DRFT_ID gets the new DRFT_ID via parameter from
OPH401A)
-- Ask users if they wanted to enter dircectly an additonal new draft
(only if user enterd a new draft before)
...get last enterd details
... set trigger to start OPH401A again to enter the next new draft
... set trigger to go back to the drafts overview
-- Button Query
-- Button Modify
-- Button Delete
-- Button Make files
(do not remove direct call, uses for cross references, and testing purposes)
-- Button List
-- Button Letters
-- Button Scan prepare
-- Button Make batches
... inform user that batches will be produced
-- Button Release
@Uses SORT on DRFT_ENTRYDATE, DRFT_ID to enable LOCATE on the
DRFT row, if cursor is coming back from one of the OPH401 related functions
(f.e. button 'Modify', 'New', ...) Without this SORT some DRFT rows are
no longer in the tabular view, causes by index "X_DRFT_03"
-- Relevant only if 'Esc' is pressed and some of the filters is changed and
not DRFT row is selected, then Magic tries to create a new DRFT row, which
is not allowed, see R.S. where task flow stops in case of 'Esc' kbd
-- fields which uses for selection
-- Variable uses for button "Select bank"
-- Radiobutton "Selection"
-- Filters
-- Buttons
-- Initialize button lables
-- set tollbar
-- Because of multiple filters which could be selected at the same time,
sometimes too many Exit events are performed, because every handler
has it's own Exit events
-- Disable menus if no draft exists for tabular view
-- It's not allowed to select "All drafts" if the filter date is null
-- Could not use ControlChange, because if new vallue is selected from F5 list
then ControlChange is not working
-- Could not use ControlChange, because if new vallue is selected from F5 list
then ControlChange is not working
-- If radiobutton "All drafts" is selected, then it's not allowed to set
the filter date = null
-- Query
-- Modify
(Not possible to use current fields from screen, because the acutal view
maybe does not contain the latest database changes, done by another user
or within another session)
... modifications for all drafts fields, is only allowed is draft is not already
in batch or in file, else inform users that only DRFT_REMARK is modifiable
-- New
-- Delete
-- Delete not possible, draft is already in batch
... else deletion is allowed, ask user for confirmation
-- User has to confirm, the creation of a bank file
-- Release draft

ExpSyntax.val: ISNULL ({0,30}) AND NOT (ISNULL ({1,16})) OR NOT (ISNULL ({0,30})) AND ISNULL ({1,16}) OR {1,16}<>{0,30}

Text.val: -- Check entries
-- Modifications not allowed if draft is already in batch or file
-- Delete allowed if draft is already in batch
-- DRFT row could be only locked, if row not locked at the moment by another
user or process
-- if drafts entered and batches are not already created --> check scanning
-- check if scanning was prepared for all drafts, if FASLE no batches could
be created (not for office = "FR")
... check if still documents have to be scanned, if TRUE no batches could
be created
-- Produce batches if
1. drafts exists to make batches
2. Scanning was prepared for all drafts
3. Scanning done for all drafts
... get runnumber to make batches for drafts
... store unique runnumber to all DRFT rows, where batches have to be produced
and delete the related HYPB rows
... start BPH402 as serverjob (Do not remove CallProg of BPH402, uses for cross
references)
... uses in parent task to inform users that batches will be produced
(Message box has to be called in parent task, to make sure that the
current transaction is closed before)
-- Inform users that no batches will be produced
-- uses in T.S., to inform users, that no drafts exists for BPH402
-- give error to user that not all drafts are scanned, means scanning has to be
still prepared for drafts
... scanning not yet done
... scanning in process
-- give error to user that not all drafts are scanned
-- First check if drafts already scanned
-- If there exists no drafts where DRFT_HYPB_BATCHNO > 0, check if drafts exists
for preparing scanning
-- Prepare scanning for drafts
... get hyparchive batchnumber
... inform users about hyparchive batchnumber, which was used
@ Check if scanning prepare for min. one draft was already performed
-- HYPB have to be also deleted, if no documents are scanned
-- uses also in T.S. to delete HYPB
-- If documents already scanned, asked user to build new index
-- If a new index has to be built, the existing HYPB rows have to be deleted
(HYPB have to be also deleted, if no documents are scanned)
-- Only if drafts exists, where documents have to be scanned
